AquaPhase Washer Disinfectors

At Astrum we understand that the key objective of healthcare professionals is not only to provide medical care, but also to protect patients, staff and visitors from the risk of healthcare transmitted infections. With increased emphasis on antibiotic control, inanimate environmental infection control is integral to supporting widespread effective hand washing initiatives. With that in mind, Astrum offers automated washing and decontamination solutions for healthcare and pharmaceutical needs. Improve your infection control with a >log 5 disinfection offered by our solutions.

The Eye Can’t See What The Eye Can’t See

Automated washer disinfectors enable achievement of best practice compliance. Our AquaPhase range of automated washers’ offers superior cleaning and disinfection performance whilst supporting the improvement of the health and safety of decontamination staff. You can be rest assured of a robust machine with limited down time and longevity that also meets ISO15883-7”. The AquaPhase boasts of proven >log 5 disinfection.

Features & Benefits
Explore All Models
AquaPhase Chemicals

F: Stainless steel body.

B: The stainless steel walls make the AquaPhase durable, robust, and therefore long-lasting.

F: Oscillating stainless steel spray arms for water and chemical application.

B: Oscillating spray arms ensure that water and chemicals are applied to every surface of the equipment being washed.

F: Availability of optional ramps and a motor controlled conveyor belt.

B: Easy loading and unloading of large items with the use of ramps and conveyor belts help negate improper lifting.

F: Choice of a wash or disinfect cycle times (3/5/7mins) depending on the size of the wash load and level of contamination.

B: Short wash and rinse cycles benefit in time savings through low equipment downtime, and at the same time allow more items to be washed and disinfected in a day.

F: An accurate & automated chemical application system.

B: The automated operation of the machines rids of guesswork and human error. This offers savings in staff cost and time, reduces human contact with the equipment, and thereby reduces the risk of cross contamination.

F: Window view into chamber.

B: Operators can visually monitor machine functionality in the chamber.

F: Factory fitted heavy-duty caster wheels.

B: Easier transportation across flat surfaces.

F: Availability of pass-through (PT) options.

B: Pass-through options enable the use of best practice ‘dirty/clean’ segregation, reducing the risk of cross-contamination.

F: Chemical disinfection process.

B: Prevents damage of equipment from thermal process options, making savings.

NOTE: Using chemical disinfection is more cost effective and safer than thermal disinfection. The combination of AQ chemicals is effective against a broad spectrum of microorganisms including MRSA and C. difficile.

F: Validated and reproducible automated cycles

B: Validated wash efficacy that meets standards and offers peace of mind to users.

F: Reuse of final rinse water for the start of the next wash cycle (optional).

B: Recycled water adds to cost savings.

AQ4800PT – Bariatric

Offering the best solution on the market to cater for your bariatric equipment. Stainless steel spray arms combined with 83 spray nozzles for improved cleaning efficiency.

Technical Features:

Outer Dimensions

  • Width 74”
  • Length 108-3/4
  • Height 77-1/4”

Effective Chamber Dimensions

  • Width 51”
  • Length 105-3/8”
  • Height 53-1/4”

Options:

  • Data and Audit Tracker (AQDC)
  • Enhancements Include Additional
  • Temperature sensors
  • Chemical injection sensors
  • Disinfection level sensors
  • Data processor
  • Printer
  • Heatrae Sadia Megaflo Unvented Water Heater x2 (DDD300)
  • Ramps – 6 Foot: 2 pairs (AQRA6)
  • Ramps – 8 Foot: 2 pairs (AQRA8)
  • Lighted Wash Chamber (AQ60)

AQ4000

The ultimate solution designed to cater for hospitals and large medical equipment. Can accommodate hospital beds and similarly sized equipment. Stainless steel spray arms combined with 60 spray nozzles for improved cleaning efficiency.

Technical Features:

  • 2 HP Motor/ Stainless Steel Pump
  • 230V, 50/60Hz, Single Phase AC Operation

Outer Dimensions:

  • Width 63-1/4”
  • Length 96-3/4”
  • Height 73”

  • Length 93-3/4”

  • Chemical injection sensors
  • Disinfection level sensors
  • Data processor
  • Printer
  • Set of Three Utility Wash Trays for AQ4000 series (AQ4353)

  • Ramps – 4 Foot: 2 pairs (AQRA4)
  • Ramps – 6 Foot: 2 pairs (AQRA6)
  • Ramps – 8 Foot: 2 pairs (AQRA8)
  • Lighted Wash Chamber (AQ60)

The standard washer within the AquaPhase range, maintaining the same quality-cleaning efficacy enabled by 23 wash nozzles.

Universal Technical Features:

  • Stainless Steel Chamber

  • Dedicated Disinfection Delivery Pipework
  • Heavy-Duty Castor Wheels
  • Powerful Pump and Motor

Chemicals

We supply chemicals for use with your AQ that have proven efficacy against infection control challenges such as bacteria, funguses, and viruses. These offer cleaning and disinfection efficiency as well as cost effectiveness against use of thermal disinfection and through automated and quantifiable chemical dosage that greatly reduces chemical lose.

Descaler (AQ223)

Volume – 5L bottles

Prevents the build up of lime scale within the wash chamber and pipework.

Detergent (AQ243)

Volume – 5L bottles

Effective against a broad spectrum of microorganisms and soil related protein.

Rinse Aid (AQ263)

Volume – 5L bottles

Aids in preventing rusting of the washer chamber and pipework, as well as acting as a surfactant that aids quicker drying of washed equipment.

Disinfectant (AQ283)

Volume – 5L bottles

Proven to be effective against a broad spectrum of microorganisms.
